Uses of Class
oshi.jna.platform.mac.CoreFoundation.CFStringRef

  • Packages that use CoreFoundation.CFStringRef 
    Package Description
    oshi.jna.platform.mac
    Provides extensions of JNA libraries for Mac OS X.

    • Uses of CoreFoundation.CFStringRef in oshi.jna.platform.mac

      Methods in oshi.jna.platform.mac that return CoreFoundation.CFStringRef 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoreFoundation.CFStringRef CoreFoundation.CFCopyDescription(CoreFoundation.CFTypeRef cf)
      Returns a textual description of a Core Foundation object.
      CoreFoundation.CFStringRef CoreFoundation.CFStringCreateWithCharacters(CoreFoundation.CFAllocatorRef alloc, char[] chars, CoreFoundation.CFIndex length)
      Creates a string from a buffer of Unicode characters.
      static CoreFoundation.CFStringRef CoreFoundation.CFStringRef.createCFString(String s)
      Convenience function which calls CoreFoundation.CFStringCreateWithCharacters(oshi.jna.platform.mac.CoreFoundation.CFAllocatorRef, char[], oshi.jna.platform.mac.CoreFoundation.CFIndex) to create a new CoreFoundation.CFStringRef from the given Java String and returns its reference pointer.
      Methods in oshi.jna.platform.mac with parameters of type CoreFoundation.CFStringRef 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte CoreFoundation.CFStringGetCString(CoreFoundation.CFStringRef theString, com.sun.jna.Pointer bufferToFill, CoreFoundation.CFIndex bufferSize, int encoding)
      Copies the character contents of a string to a local C string buffer after converting the characters to a given encoding.
      CoreFoundation.CFIndex CoreFoundation.CFStringGetLength(CoreFoundation.CFStringRef theString)
      Returns the number (in terms of UTF-16 code pairs) of Unicode characters in a string.
      CoreFoundation.CFTypeRef IOKit.IORegistryEntry.createCFProperty(CoreFoundation.CFStringRef key)
      Convenience method for IOKit.IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(oshi.jna.platform.mac.IOKit.IORegistryEntry, oshi.jna.platform.mac.CoreFoundation.CFStringRef, oshi.jna.platform.mac.CoreFoundation.CFAllocatorRef, int) to create a CF representation of this registry entry's property.
      CoreFoundation.CFTypeRef IOKit.IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(IOKit.IORegistryEntry entry, CoreFoundation.CFStringRef key, CoreFoundation.CFAllocatorRef allocator, int options)
      Create a CF representation of a registry entry's property.
      CoreFoundation.CFTypeRef IOKit.IORegistryEntrySearchCFProperty(IOKit.IORegistryEntry entry, String plane, CoreFoundation.CFStringRef key, CoreFoundation.CFAllocatorRef allocator, int options)
      Create a CF representation of a registry entry's property.
